title: Luxurious mincemeat Christmas cake
ingredients: ['To soak', '1 (411g) jar luxurious mincemeat', '100g (4oz) ready to eat prunes, roughly chopped', '50g (2oz) glace cherries, quartered', '175g (6oz) mixed dried fruit', '50g (2oz) chopped candied peel', '150ml (5 fl oz) medium sherry', 'For the rest of the cake', '225g (8oz) plain flour', '3 level teaspoons baking powder', '150g (5oz) softened butter', '150g (5oz) dark brown soft sugar', 'Grated zest 1 small orange', 'Grated zest 1 small lemon', '3 eggs']
